Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Reroute at Commercial/92nd
ShortDescription: 71 71st/South Shore buses are temp rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 92nd, Houston, 91st and Commercial, near Commercial/92nd

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Commercial, 92nd, Houston, 91st and Commercial then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Commercial/92nd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express & #28 Stony Island Temporary Reroute near 75th/South Shore Drive
ShortDescription: #6 Jackson Park Express & #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 75th/South Shore Drive.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express & #28 Stony Island buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 75th/South Shore Drive.

#6 Jackson Park Express buses will operate via South Shore, 75th, Coles, and 79th to terminal.

#28 Stony Island buses will operate via South Shore, 75th, Coles, 79th and South Shore.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kilpatrick
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner & Division, due to street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner and Division, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Service Delayed near 95th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at 95th due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at 95th due to signal problems. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
